Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in @hapi/hoek.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.3.2 before 8.5.1, all versions starting from 9.0.0 before 9.0.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.3.2, all versions starting from 8.5.1 before 9.0.0, all versions starting from 9.0.3
